pages.text: 1|1|allaah ke naam se, jo atyant krpaasheel tatha dayaavaan hai.
1|2|sab prashansaayen allaah[1] ke lie hain, jo saare sansaaron ka paalanahaar[2] hai.
1|4|jo pratikaar[1] (badale) ke din ka maalik hai.
1|5|(he allaah!) ham keval tujhee ko poojate hain aur keval tujhee se sahaayata maangate[1] hain.
1|7|unaka maarg, jinapar toone puraskaar kiya.[1] unaka nahin, jinapar tera prakop[2] hua aur na hee unaka, jo kupath (gumaraah) ho gaye.
